edithara aakalpayak ha satankami jiwayak athi ayawalun pirisak lesa peni siti me pirisa nithara gamane yedima ha wenath kamkaru kandayam samaga aashraya kirima athulath siya wruththimaya swarupaya nisa abhitha wuth swadhina wuth adhikari balayata wiruddhawa nangi sitimata wuwath sudanam pirisak wiya. 1906 di mema karaththakaruwan siyaludena warjanayaka yedemin ingirasi aandukaraya wetha siya dukganawili idiripath kirima sandaha pethsamak ragena giyaha. 800 k pamana wu mema pirisa karaththawala wiyagasa matha nanga asabhya sindu kiyamin ha wiwidha rangum pamin suruttu bomin polisiyata samachchal karamin kolambaa nagaraya pura sancharaya kaleya.
